highlightCode: import { Component, OnInit, Input, ChangeDetectorRef, EventEmitter, Output, } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable, of } from 'rxjs'; import { ScGridColumnComponent } from '@scales-library/grid/grid-column/grid-column.component'; import { ScGridSetting } from '@scales-library/grid/grid-models/grid-column'; import { ScCheckState, ScSortDirection } from '@scales-library/grid/grid-models/enums'; import { ScGridService } from '@scales-library/grid/grid.service'; import { take } from 'rxjs/operators'; interface Activity { activityID: number; activityEntityID: number; activityEntityType: string; statusName: string; details: ActivityDetails[]; summary: string; text: string; type: string; ownerDisplayName: string; dateCreatedUtc: Date; updatedAtUtc: Date; updatedBy: string; createdByUserID: number; relatedEntities: any[]; attachments: any[]; jobTitle: string; companyID?: number; companyName: string; } interface Contact { contactID: number; isCandidate: boolean; linkedCandidateID?: number; firstName: string; lastName: string; name: string; phone: PhoneNumber; mobile: PhoneNumber; email: string; otherEmail: string[]; company: Company; initials: string; headshotUrl: string; headshotThumbnailUrl: string; excludeFromBulkEmails: boolean; isHiringManager: boolean; status: ContactStatus; lastUpdatedDate: string; recruiters: number[]; owner?: number; salutation: string; position: string; reportsTo: Contact; address: Address; socialLinks: SocialLinks; customFields: Map<number, CustomFieldValue>; } interface ContactStatus { statusID: number; name: string; closed: boolean; } interface SocialLinks { facebookUrl: string; linkedInUrl: string; twitterUrl: string; googlePlusUrl: string; gitHubUrl: string; stackOverflowUrl: string; instagramUrl: string; wordPressUrl: string; skypeUrl: string; otherUrl: string; } interface Address { addressID: string; name: string; displayName: string; line1: string; line2: string; suburb: string; state: string; postcode: string; country: string; countryCode: string; phone: PhoneNumber; url: string; } interface PhoneNumber { formattedNumber: string; normalizedNumber: string; extension: string; } interface ActivityDetails { fieldName: string; textValue: string; } interface ColumnFilterValue { columnName: string; value: string; } interface EntityActivityNoteFilter { entityID: number; keywords?: string; page?: number; pageSize?: number; sortKey: string; sortDirection: string; columnFilterFields?: ColumnFilterValue[]; } const CandidateActivityTypeDescription: { [key: string]: string } = { Screening: 'Screening', ReferenceCheck: 'Reference Check', CandidateCare: 'Candidate Care', BackgroundCheck: 'Background Check', VisaWorkRights: 'Visa / Work Rights', Onboarding: 'Onboarding', Compliance: 'Compliance', Induction: 'Induction', Other: 'Other', }; interface Company { companyID: number; name: string; initials: string; imageUrl: string; imageThumbnailUrl: string; primaryContact: Contact; addresses: Address[]; remoteLookedUp: boolean; address: Address; otherAddresses: Address[]; parentCompany: Company; socialLinks: SocialLinks; customFields: Map<number, CustomFieldValue>; status: Status; latestTerms: CompanyAttachment; attachments: CompanyAttachment[]; } interface CompanyAttachment extends Attachment { companyID: number; companyAttachmentTypeGroup: CompanyAttachmentType; } enum CompanyAttachmentType { Other = 'Other', Terms = 'Terms', PaymentDetails = 'PaymentDetails', } interface Attachment { entityID: number; attachmentID: string; tempID: string; name: string; url: string; viewerUrl: string; dateUpdatedUtc?: Date; attachmentType: string; dateCreated: Date; expiryDate: Date; owner: string; fileSize: number; } interface WorkflowStage { stageID: number; displayIndex: number; progress: string; // possible value: inactive, started, inprogress, complete forecast: number; stage: Stage; } interface Workflow { accountID: number; workflowID: number; name: string; placementType: string; isDefault: boolean; stages: WorkflowStage[]; userGroups: number[]; userGroupNames: string[]; } interface Stage { stageID: number; name: string; progress: string; // possible value: inactive, started, inprogress, complete displayIndex: number; default: boolean; forecast: number; workflowCount?: number; usedInWorkflows?: Workflow[]; isDeleting?: boolean; } interface Status { statusID: number; name: string; closed: boolean; default: boolean; rejected: boolean; stage: Stage; } interface JobApplication { jobApplicationID: number; jobOrderID: number; jobOrderWorkflowID: number; jobOrderSource: string; placementID?: number; jobTitle: string; company?: Company; candidate: Candidate; status: Status; hasPlacement: boolean; source: string; searchRank: number; location: string; locationDisplayName: string; phone: PhoneNumber; mobile: PhoneNumber; inboundJobApplicationCount?: number; hasCoverLetterVideo: boolean; address: Address; idealPosition: string; idealSalary: WorkTypeSalary; owner: UserLink; recruiter: UserLink; customFields: Map<number, CustomFieldValue>; hasBeenViewed: boolean; noteSummary: NoteSummary; salutation: string; linkedInUrl: string; jobApplicationPopupUrl: string; reviewStage: string; rating: number; candidateInternalRating: string; dateCreated: string; dateUpdated: string; dataPolicyConsentAtUtc: string; partnerAction: PartnerActionStatus[]; extensionData: any; checked: boolean; candidateRecruitersNameList: string; candidateRecruiters: UserLink[]; } interface WorkTypeSalary { workType: WorkType; salary: Salary; } interface WorkType { workTypeID: number; name: string; salaryType: SalaryType; placementType: PlacementType; } enum SalaryType { NotSpecified = 'NotSpecified', PerHour = 'PerHour', PerDay = 'PerDay', PerWeek = 'PerWeek', PerMonth = 'PerMonth', PerYear = 'PerYear', } enum PlacementType { Permanent = 'Permanent', Contract = 'Contract', Temporary = 'Temporary', Credit = 'Credit', } const SalaryTypeDescription: { [key: string]: string } = { PerHour: 'Hourly Rate', PerDay: 'Daily Rate', PerWeek: 'Weekly Rate', PerMonth: 'Monthly Rate', PerYear: 'Annual Salary', }; interface Salary { type: SalaryType; salaryRange: string; salaryMin?: number; salaryMax?: number; unitPerUnit: number; chargeRate: number; } interface StartDate { type: StartDateType; date: Date; } enum StartDateType { NotSpecified = 'NotSpecified', DateSpecified = 'DateSpecified', Immediate = 'Immediate', In1Week = 'In1Week', In2Weeks = 'In2Weeks', In3Weeks = 'In3Weeks', In4Weeks = 'In4Weeks', In1Month = 'In1Month', In2Months = 'In2Months', In3Months = 'In3Months', In4Months = 'In4Months', In5Months = 'In5Months', In6Months = 'In6Months', } const AccountFeatures = { email: 'email', sms: 'sms', jobOrders: 'jobOrders', folders: 'folders', jobApplications: 'jobApplications', candidates: 'candidates', candidateAttachments: 'candidateAttachments', candidateSkills: 'candidateSkills', candidateSubmissions: 'candidateSubmissions', candidateSubmissionComments: 'candidateSubmissionComments', placements: 'placements', companies: 'companies', contacts: 'contacts', skills: 'skills', careerUpdate: 'careerUpdate', seekTSC: 'seekTSC', subCategory: 'subCategory', ratesAdder: 'ratesAdder', }; enum FieldType { Text, List, Date, Lookup, Url, } class PartnerMenuActionItem { actionID: string; name: string; activeOnly: boolean; approvedOnly: boolean; url: string; urlType: string; status: number[]; enabled: boolean; } class PartnerMenuAction { partnerID: number; menuName: string; columnName: string; actions: PartnerMenuActionItem[]; } interface CustomFieldName { fieldID: number; name: string; fieldType: FieldType; isMultiValue: boolean; isDate: boolean; isUrl: boolean; isList: boolean; possibleValues: string[]; mandatory: boolean; maximumLength: number; } const StartDateTypeDescription: { [key: string]: string } = { NotSpecified: '', DateSpecified: 'Select a Date', Immediate: 'Immediate', In1Week: '1 Week', In2Weeks: '2 Weeks', In3Weeks: '3 Weeks', In4Weeks: '4 Weeks', In1Month: '1 Month', In2Months: '2 Months', In3Months: '3 Months', In4Months: '4 Months', In5Months: '5 Months', In6Months: '6 Months', }; interface Candidate { candidateID: number; name: string; firstName: string; lastName: string; salutation: string; phone: PhoneNumber; mobile: PhoneNumber; email: string; otherEmail: string[]; address: Address; currentPosition: string; currentEmployer: string; currentSalary: WorkTypeSalary; availability: StartDate; idealPosition: string; idealSalary: WorkTypeSalary; otherSalaries: WorkTypeSalary[]; recruiters: number[]; socialLinks: SocialLinks; headshotThumbnailUrl: string; headshotUrl: string; initials: string; rank: number; resume: Attachment; formattedResume: Attachment; coverLetter: Attachment; internalRating: string; source: string; customFields: { [key: string]: CustomFieldValue }; excludeFromBulkEmails: boolean; status: Status; remoteLookedUp: boolean; dateOfBirth: Date; emergencyContactName: string; emergencyContactNumber: string; dateResumeUpdated: string; linkedContactID: number; lastPlaced: string; seeking: CandidateSeeking; isPayrollLookups: boolean; payrollOffice: string; payrollSkillGroup: string; payrollPosition: string; } interface CandidateSeeking { status: CandidateSeekingStatus; dateUpdatedUtc: string; } enum CandidateSeekingStatus { Yes = 'Yes', Maybe = 'Maybe', No = 'No', } const CandidateSeekingStatusDescription: { [key: string]: string } = { Yes: 'Actively Looking', Maybe: 'Open to Opportunities', No: 'Not Interested', }; interface UserLink extends PersonName { userID: number; displayName: string; mentionName: string; email: string; initials: string; headshotUrl: string; deleted: boolean; fullName: string; } interface PersonName { firstName: string; lastName: string; fullName: string; } interface PartnerActionStatus { partnerID: number; stage: string; stageText: string; status: string; updated: string; result: PartnerActionResult; } interface PartnerActionResult { url: string; urlPopup: boolean; } interface NoteSummary { noteType: string; dateCreatedUtc: Date; } interface CustomFieldValue { fieldID: number; value?: string; valueList?: string[]; } @Component({ selector: 'nz-demo-grid-candidate', template: ` <div class="manage-column" [(nzPopoverVisible)]="candidateActivityColumnSettingVisible" nz-popover nzPopoverTrigger="click" nzPopoverPlacement="bottomRight" [nzPopoverContent]="manageCandidateActivityColumns" > <i class="app-icon icon-primary" nz-icon nzType="ja:setting"></i> </div> <ng-template #manageCandidateActivityColumns> <ng-container *ngIf="activityAllColumn$ | async as activityAllColumn"> <sc-grid-manage-column [scAllColumns]="activityAllColumn" (scClose)="candidateActivityColumnSettingVisible = false" (scReset)="resetGridSettings()" (scSave)="saveGridSettings($event)" ></sc-grid-manage-column> </ng-container> </ng-template> <sc-grid [scGridData]="activities" [scGridSetting]="aGridSettings" [scGridName]="gridName" scIdPropertyName="activityID" [scCanUserSelectColumn]="fullView" [scIsFitToParent]="!fullView" [scShowInlineCheckAll]="false" [scPageSize]="pageSize" [scPageIndex]="pageIndex" [scTotalCount]="totalCount" [scShowCheckbox]="false" [scIsServerSideSearch]="true" [scActiveID]="(isActivityDrawerOpen$ | async) ? activeRowID : ''" [scSearchKeyword]="searchKeyword" (scRawColumnsUpdated)="onActivitiesRawColumns($event)" (scFilterChange)="columnSearchChange($event)" (scSortChange)="onSortChange($event)" (scPageChange)="onPageChange($event)" (scPageSizeChange)="onPageSizeChange($event)" > <sc-grid-column scHeader="Record" [scFixedWidth]="70" scLeft="0" [scCanSort]="false" scTranslate="no"> <ng-template let-item="item"> <!-- <i class="app-icon record-type" nz-icon nzType="user"></i> --> <i nz-icon nzType="user" nzTheme="outline"></i> </ng-template> </sc-grid-column> <sc-grid-column scHeader="Activity Type" scBinding="type" scSortKey="type" [scDefaultSort]="ScSortDirection.Descend" [scScaleWidth]="2" [scCanSearch]="true" [scCanSearchColumn]="true" scTranslate="no" > <ng-template let-item="item"> <!-- {{ getActivityTypeDisplay(item) }} --> <span [innerHTML]="getActivityTypeDisplay(item) | prefixHighlight: searchKeyword"> </span> </ng-template> </sc-grid-column> <sc-grid-column scHeader="Activity Name" scBinding="text" scSortKey="action name" [scDefaultSort]="ScSortDirection.Descend" [scScaleWidth]="2" [scCanSearch]="true" [scCanSearchColumn]="true" ></sc-grid-column> <sc-grid-column scHeader="Details" [scScaleWidth]="4" [scCanSearch]="true" [scDisplay]="fullView" [scCanSort]="false" > <ng-template let-item="item"> <ng-container *ngIf="item.statusName">Change status to - {{ item.statusName }}. </ng-container> <ng-container *ngIf="item.details"> <span *ngFor="let detail of item.details" class="acitivty-details" [innerHTML]="getDetails(detail) | prefixHighlight: searchKeyword" > </span> <!-- <span *ngFor="let detail of item.details" class="acitivty-details" >  {{ detail.fieldName }}: {{ detail.textValue }}. </span> --> </ng-container> </ng-template> </sc-grid-column> <sc-grid-column scHeader="Job Title" scBinding="jobTitle" scSortKey="jobOrderTitle" [scDefaultSort]="ScSortDirection.Descend" [scScaleWidth]="4" [scCanSearch]="true" [scDisplay]="fullView" [scCanSearchColumn]="true" scTranslate="no" > <ng-template let-item="item"> <a [href]="'joborders/' + item.jobOrderID">{{ item.jobTitle }}</a> </ng-template> </sc-grid-column> <sc-grid-column scHeader="Created By" scBinding="ownerDisplayName" scSortKey="createdBy" [scDefaultSort]="ScSortDirection.Descend" [scFixedWidth]="110" [scCanSearch]="true" [scCanSearchColumn]="true" ></sc-grid-column> <sc-grid-column scHeader="Updated" scBinding="updatedAtUtc" scSortKey="updatedDate" [scDefaultSort]="ScSortDirection.Descend" [scFixedWidth]="110" scDataType="dateTime" ></sc-grid-column> <sc-grid-column scHeader="Actions" scRight="0" [scFixedWidth]="70" [scCanSort]="false"> <ng-template let-item="item"> <span class="action-icons"> <a [href]="getDownloadUrl(item)"> <i class="download app-icon" nz-icon nzType="outline:download" nzTooltipTitle="Download" nzTooltipPlacement="top" nz-tooltip > </i> </a> <a class="view-activity identity-column clickable" nz-tooltip nzTooltipTitle="View Activity" nzTooltipPlacement="left" (click)="showActivity(item)" > <i nz-icon nzType="right"></i> </a> </span> </ng-template> </sc-grid-column> </sc-grid>`, styles: [` .manage-column { background-color: white; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; border: 1px solid #ccd0d9; cursor: pointer; border-radius: 3px; height: 32px; width: 40px; margin-left: auto; } `] }) export class NzDemoGridCandidateComponent implements OnInit { @Input() fullView: boolean; @Input() searchKeyword: string = 'highlight'; @Input() activeRowID: number; @Output() activeRowChange = new EventEmitter<number>(); activities: any[]; activityFilter: EntityActivityNoteFilter; isActivityDrawerOpen$: Observable<boolean>; columns: ScGridColumnComponent[] = []; columnFilters: ColumnFilterValue[]; pageIndex = 1; pageSize: number; sortKey: string; sortDirection: string; defaultSortKey = 'updatedDate'; defaultSortDirection = ScSortDirection.Descend; totalCount: number; gridName = 'candidateActivityGrid'; ScSortDirection = ScSortDirection; cGridSettings: ScGridSetting; selectedIDs$: Observable<number[]>; cActiveID: string | number = ''; cGrayTextIDs: (string | number)[] = []; aGridSettings: ScGridSetting; candidateActivityColumnSettingVisible: boolean; activityAllColumn$: Observable<ScGridColumnComponent[]>; constructor( private cdRef: ChangeDetectorRef, private gridService: ScGridService ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.fullView = true; this.selectedIDs$ = of([9537426, 9537425]); this.cActiveID = 9537427; this.cGrayTextIDs = [9537615, 9537610]; this.initAGridSettings(); this.initActivitiesArray(); } onSortChange(sort: any) { this.sortKey = !!sort.key ? sort.key : this.defaultSortKey; this.sortDirection = !!sort.value ? sort.value : this.defaultSortDirection; this.loadActivities(); } onPageSizeChange(pageSize: number) { this.pageIndex = 1; this.pageSize = pageSize; this.loadActivities(); } onPageChange(pageIndex: number) { this.pageIndex = pageIndex; this.loadActivities(); } private primarySearch() { // this.store.dispatch(fromRoot.searchActivity({ searchKeyword: this.searchKeyword })); this.pageIndex = 1; this.loadActivities(); } columnSearchChange(e: { columnName: string; searchText: string }[]) { this.columnFilters = e.map((f) => ({ columnName: f.columnName, value: f.searchText })); this.pageIndex = 1; this.loadActivities(); } getActivityTypeDisplay(item: Activity) { if (!item.activityEntityType) { return ''; } return `${CandidateActivityTypeDescription[item.type]} highlight`; } loadActivities() { this.activityFilter = { entityID: 1000, keywords: this.searchKeyword ? this.searchKeyword : '', page: this.pageIndex, pageSize: this.pageSize, sortKey: this.sortKey, sortDirection: this.sortDirection, columnFilterFields: this.columnFilters, }; /* this.candidateService.getActivities(this.activityFilter).subscribe((a) => { this.activities = a.records; this.totalCount = a.totalCount; this.store.dispatch(fromRoot.loadActivityCollectionSuccess({ activities: a.records })); this.cdRef.markForCheck(); }); */ } showActivity(activity: Activity) { /* this.store.dispatch( fromRoot.OpenDrawer({ componentToken: Inject_ActivityDetailDrawer, inputParams: { entityID: activity.activityEntityID, activityID: activity.activityID, entityType: activity.activityEntityType, }, canPush: true, maskClosable: true, }) ); */ this.activeRowID = activity.activityID; this.activeRowChange.emit(activity.activityID); this.cdRef.markForCheck(); } onActivitiesRawColumns(data: any) { this.activityAllColumn$ = data; } gridSettingColumnsUpdated(data: ScGridSetting) { this.aGridSettings = data; } getDownloadUrl(activity: Activity) { return `local/${activity.activityID}/download`; } public getDetails(detail: { fieldName: string; textValue: string }): string { return ` ${detail.fieldName}: ${detail.textValue}.`; } updateGridSettings(gridSettings: any) { console.log(gridSettings); } updateGridColumnSettings(gridColumnSettings: any) { console.log(gridColumnSettings); } resetGridSettings(): void { this.initAGridSettings(); this.candidateActivityColumnSettingVisible = false; } saveGridSettings($event: any): void { this.aGridSettings = { gridName: this.aGridSettings.gridName, columns: $event.columns } as ScGridSetting; this.candidateActivityColumnSettingVisible = false; } initAGridSettings(): void { this.aGridSettings = { gridName: this.gridName, columns: [ { name: 'Record', width: 0.0, display: true }, { name: 'Activity Type', width: 0.0, display: true }, { name: 'Activity Name', width: 0.0, display: true }, { name: 'Details', width: 366.0, display: true }, { name: 'Job Title', width: 112.0, display: true }, { name: 'Created By', width: 0.0, display: true }, { name: 'Updated', width: 0.0, display: true }, { name: 'Actions', width: 0.0, display: true }, ], pageSize: 20, sortKey: '', }; this.activityAllColumn$ = this.gridService.getAllGridColumns$(this.aGridSettings.gridName).pipe(take(1)); } initActivitiesArray(): void { this.activities = [ { activityID: 15526, activityEntityID: 13825556, activityEntityType: 'Candidate', jobOrderID: null, jobTitle: null, statusName: null, details: [{ fieldName: 'What why when how? highlight', textValue: 'Yes highlight' }], summary: null, text: 'TestTemplate highlight Action-DONOTDELETE', type: 'ReferenceCheck', ownerDisplayName: 'Allison Qu highlight', dateCreatedUtc: '0001-01-01T00:00:00', updatedAtUtc: '2021-08-24T10:09:30Z', updatedBy: null, relatedEntities: [], attachments: [], }, { activityID: 15525, activityEntityID: 13825556, activityEntityType: 'Candidate', jobOrderID: null, jobTitle: null, statusName: null, details: [ { fieldName: 'What why when how? highlight', textValue: '2021-08 highlight' }, { fieldName: 'Comments highlight', textValue: 'test highlight' }, ], summary: null, text: 'Automation highlight candidate activity', type: 'Screening', ownerDisplayName: 'Allison Qu highlight', dateCreatedUtc: '0001-01-01T00:00:00', updatedAtUtc: '2021-08-24T02:25:50Z', updatedBy: null, relatedEntities: [], attachments: [], }, ]; } FieldType: typeof FieldType = FieldType; CheckState = ScCheckState; loading$: Observable<boolean>; customFields$: Observable<CustomFieldName[]>; partnerActions: PartnerMenuAction[]; statuses: Status[]; activeJobApplicationID: number; readonly companyFeature = AccountFeatures.companies; readonly contactsFeature = AccountFeatures.contacts; updateRating(e: any, jobApplication: JobApplication) { jobApplication = { ...jobApplication, rating: e * 2 }; } onCheckedChange(e: { checked: boolean; items: JobApplication[] }) {} statusSelectOpen(open: boolean, jobApplication: JobApplication) {} }
